evidence_items.text: A tug driving instructor (tug instructor) and trainee tug driver (trainee driver) were seated beside each other in the tug. The flight crew were in communication with the headset operator via the aircraft’s interphone.
The trainee driver decided to stop the pushback and asked the tug instructor to take over.

After swapping seats the instructor recommenced the pushback, correcting the aircraft back onto the taxiway centreline. He continued to reassure and advise the trainee while performing the pushback, looking at her while doing so. The headset operator continued walking on the right side of the tug, abeam its cabin. The wingman was on the left just ahead of the tug.

The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.
The tug instructor pulled the aircraft forward off the fence then stopped the tug.

slot_statements.availability: The procedural deviation related to environment or marking deficiency in the pushback process for Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA on 12-25 is documented and accessible within the hist_composition_t1_early scope.
slot_statements.defeater_resistance: The assessment of the environment or marking deficiency in the pushback procedural deviation for Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA on 12-25 withstands counterarguments and alternative explanations within the hist_composition_t1_early scope.
slot_statements.fit_to_key_features: The identified environment or marking deficiency aligns with key features of procedural deviations observed in pushback operations for Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA, ensuring relevance within the hist_composition_t1_early scope.

slot_statements.availability: The communication breakdown during the pushback procedural deviation on Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA on 12-25 is well-documented in the early historical composition records, ensuring the availability of relevant data for analysis.
slot_statements.defeater_resistance: The scope and analysis of the communication breakdown are resistant to defeaters, as alternative explanations such as equipment failure or environmental factors have been ruled out based on the comprehensive early historical data.
slot_statements.fit_to_key_features: The identified communication breakdown aligns closely with key features of procedural deviations in pushback operations, including miscommunication between ground crew and flight deck, fitting the characteristic patterns observed in similar incidents.

CS__R1_PUSHBACK_PROCEDURAL_DEVIATION__R2.statement: The communication breakdown during the pushback procedural deviation on Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA on 12-25 is well-documented in the early historical composition records, ensuring the availability of relevant data for analysis.

The scope and analysis of the communication breakdown are resistant to defeaters, as alternative explanations such as equipment failure or environmental factors have been ruled out based on the comprehensive early historical data.

The identified communication breakdown aligns closely with key features of procedural deviations in pushback operations, including miscommunication between ground crew and flight deck, fitting the characteristic patterns observed in similar incidents.
